DOC.brief_summary: Procure blood specimens from individuals presenting to the emergency department with suspected brain injury.
DOC.brief_title: MIND (Management of Traumatic Brain Injury Diagnosis)
DOC.criteria: Informed Consent Form Signed 18 years of age or older For women of childbearing age: Not known to be pregnant AND Head Trauma within 6 hours of ED presentation with Glasgow Coma Scores from 38 (Severe Injury), 913 (Moderate Injury), or 1415 (Mild Injury); OR Head trauma within 6 hours of ED presentation with Glasgow Coma Score of 15; OR Bone fracture or polytraumas, both with no head trauma Known preexisting neurological condition that causes observed symptoms Recent history of head injury or seizures (within 1 year of current ED presentation) Prisoner
